title: (x) NYT fonts - Stymie, Cheltenham {Mark S}
content:
![Rockwell?](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052108im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25490.jpg) ![Gifted](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052108im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25491.jpg) ![Tagline](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052108im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25492.jpg)   
   
Any help Appreciated. The headline looks like Rockwell bold, but different.
author: apocalypso

comments.content: The large headline is [Stymie Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/stymie/ef-black/testdrive.html?s=OneofOurOwn&p=48). The others are versions of [Cheltenham](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cheltenham-old-style/cheltenham-old-style/testdrive.html?s=Giftedfromthestart%2C&p=48).
I think I remember the designer being interviewed on NPR about the redesign of The New York Times, sometime last summer.
